<noinclude>{{tl|China Song Counter}}</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgChinaTempleSongCounter) || !$wgChinaTempleSongCounter}--><!--{assign var="wgChinaTempleSongCounter" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    mw.loader.implement("widgetChinaTempleSongCounter",function($, jQuery){
        $(function(){
            $('#CSC').text($('.' + $('#CSC')[0].dataset.class).length);
            $('.CSCInfo').show();
        });
    });
});</script><style>.CSCInfo{display:none;}</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
